content.en: Antenna optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can optimize the design of antennas, making them more efficient and cost-effective. By using techniques such as co-kriging, response surface approximation, and surrogate models, algorithms can improve the multi-objective design of antennas. Additionally, algorithms can expedite the design optimization process by utilizing variable-fidelity simulation models, sparse gradient updates, and trust-region-based adaptive response scaling. These advancements in algorithmic optimization have the potential to revolutionize the field of antenna design.
